org.ljtoolkit.services
Class LiveJournalService

java.lang.Object
  org.ljtoolkit.services.LiveJournalService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILiveJournalService
public class LiveJournalService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILiveJournalService

This class provides the live journal FLAT service implementation. The methods in this class wrap the following Live Journal Flat Protocols:

  • getchallenge
  • login
  • checkfriends
  • getfriends
  • getfriendgroups
  • friendof
  • editfriends
  • editfriendgroups
  • getdaycounts
  • getevents
  • editevent

Author:
Troy Bourdon
See Also:
ILiveJournalService

                                 boolean isPublic)
                          throws LiveJournalServiceException

postEvent

public int postEvent(TransformEventParams params)
              throws LiveJournalServiceException
This method is used to post an event to Live Journal. Before making this call the TransformEventParams class needs to be setup in an appropriate manner. See the documentation for the TransformEventParams class for more details.

Specified by:
postEvent in interface ILiveJournalService

eventId
